name: Desert Bus Harrier
description:
Made for the 2018 Desert Bus for Hope Game Jam

Pixel art by CataclysmicReverb

Marvel in a 3d game that pretends to be a 2d game pretending to be a 3d game! Inspired by games like space harrier, we took a 3d engine, only used 2d assets, but used 3d space! Wow!

Join one of four colourful drivers that provide no difference in gameplay because we ran out of time!

Star Adventurer: Inbetween their day job of fighting off evil space technomagics, this adventurer enjoys collecting the loudest clothing possible and caring for small floating pets.

Cyborg Soldier: The only soldier left in the galaxy. All others were considered redundant.

%s: Has the unique talent of being able to hide from, and navigate through the galactic network without losing any sanity to the stress of a trillion screaming voices.

Bozu: This tiny ghost is searching the galaxy for people to scare. Really, it just wants to make friends and excite them.
